import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../../styles/service.css' const className='carousel slide carousel-fade' export default function Service() { const size = useWindowSize(); console.log(size) useEffect(()=>{ if(size<576){ document.getElementById('carouselExampleFade').classList.add(className) document.getElementById('carouselInner').classList.add('carouselInner') } },[size]) return (

) } function useWindowSize() { const [width, setWindowSize] = useState(undefined); useEffect(() => { function handleResize() { setWindowSize( window.innerWidth); } window.addEventListener("resize", handleResize); handleResize(); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", handleResize); }, []); return width; }
